channel.title: genes on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in genes on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-03
item.description: Here’s everything Apple could announce at its March 8 ‘Peek performance’ special event (5 minute read) Apple will hold its ‘Peek Performance’ virtual event on March 8.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-21
item.description: First details leak on Project Iris, Google’s next AR headset (3 minute read) Google is developing a new augmented reality headset that it plans to ship sometime in 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-17
item.description: Meta’s sci-fi haptic glove prototype lets you feel VR objects using air pockets (6 minute read) Meta has revealed a pair of haptic gloves that lets people feel objects in virtual reality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-14
item.description: Elon Musk’s SpaceX inks satellite connectivity deal with Google Cloud (3 minute read) Google has signed a deal with SpaceX to use Starlink with its cloud unit.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-28
item.description: Apple’s M2 chip has entered production and will ship as soon as July (2 minute read) Apple’s custom-designed M2 chips entered production this month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-17
item.description: Foxconn allegedly testing folding iPhone, projected Sept. 2022 release (1 minute read) According to supply chain reports, Foxconn is testing a folding iPhone for Apple.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-13
item.description: The Surface Duo, Microsoft’s first-ever Android phone, is $1,400 (6 minute read) The Surface Duo is now available for pre-order and will ship on September 10.
